channel.title: Need Staff!
channel.description:
Sorry if this is long locations for this topic i am new on these forums so forgive me....
Anyway i have a 562 source and i am trying to get a good reliable server going so i need people to help.
I need Coders to help For one i need a client that will run a 562 and without a seperate cache. I also need a coder to help with the source. I need reliable trustworthy people.
I also will need when the server is released i will need Admins and Mods. If anyone has any suggestions or would like to join me in this server please post a comment and or email me at mhbstudio@hotmail.com
"JUST TO LET YOU ALL KNOW I HAVE HOSTED SEVERAL SERVERS BEFORE BUT THE BEST ONE I HAD WAS SHUTDOWN BY JAGEX.LTD CUZ THEY ARE HOMO!!!"
